label: Description
value: Oblique view of a richly wooded valley which rises toward right. Mountains are in the rear. A stately home is shown in the right foreground.

label: Description
value: A mountain with a glacier in the hollow center, and with cloud-capped peaks at left, rises in the right and central rear. A wooded slope is shown in the middle distance. A church with a well in front of it and a house with laundry hanging out are shown in the foreground.

label: Physical description
value: Oil and traces of graphite on thin paperboard

label: Dimensions

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of mountains and a lake in the foreground, taken from a more northern standpoint than 1917-4-569A.  St. Bartholomae is shown in the left middle distance, the gully in the right center.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and oil, pencil on cardboard

label: Description
value: An oblique view into the street, lined with thatch roofed buildings, with two children and a woman barely visible in the middle ground. Clouds are suggested by the brush strokes above.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream colored wove paper, darkened to brown and pieced along right edge.

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of a house with tower, in the center middle distance, flanked by and in front of trees.  In the foreground is a lawn which is bordered at the rear by a low stone wall.  The creamy ground color is visible at the lower right and left edges.

label: Physical description
value: Brush and oil paint, graphite traces on paperboard

Broken Columns, View from the Parthenon

label: Description
value: Oil sketch of ruined columns. The lower part of a standing column and the neighboring four fragments of columns, in the western part of the south side of the Parthenon, shown from the inside. Detailed landscape background. Part of the wall is sketched upon the lateral margin which shows, as does the bottom margin, brownish grounding color.

value: Horizontal view of the Goell rises in the right distance, and the Watzmann at the left.   In the foreground a grassy alp overlooks a deep valley, left, on the floor of which is  a small village.

value: The lower parts of two bays and the separating columns of one long side are shown.  Parts of the entablature and a capital lie in the foreground.  The tan ground color is shown laterally and along the lower edge.  In the upper left corner, mathematical figures and a small plan.

Sunset across the Hudson Valley, New York

label: Description
value: A view over wooded hills in foreground, through a middle distance showing a lake beneath a strip of blue sky with golden-yellow illuminated clouds reflecting the last of the setting sun, and looking toward distant dark mountains capped by heavy dark brownish-gray clouds beyond.

value: Brush and oil paint, graphite on thin cream paperboard

label: Description
value: The plain is shown in the distance against a background of mountains with Mount Hôr at the extreme right.  A  valley leads backwards to the plain, in the fore and middle grounds.  A river bed winds through it, a road along the hillside at right.  Dromedaries and men are shown upon it.  Inscribed figures.

Mt. Lebanon between Yafoof and Baalbek

label: Description
value:
The snow-capped Lebanon is shown in the background across a plain. Ragged foothills of the Anti-Lebanon are in the foreground. Inscribed figures and: green / ploughed in great streaks / soft distant green / village; purple / green / & ploughed red / grass / very broken in blocks / ledges stones / reddish earth and yellow grass / grass among rocks / rock grey with salmon / earth red.
Inscribed bottom right: 2 soft yel brown / 3 dark greenish warmer towards base / Mt. Lebanon between Yafoof & Baalbec / Morning / May 6th / 68.

label: Description
value: Horizontal view showing in top row, at left:  a sail boat with three men in it, and a bank of the river; at right: a sail boat shown from the stern; at bottom left: a sail boat with one man in it and a river bank; at right: a walking man carrying wood on the back, shown form the back.

Doric Greek Temples of Athena (formerly Ceres), Hera II (formerly Neptune), and Hera I (formerly Basilica), Paestum, Salerno, Italy

label: Description
value: Horizontal panoramic view of the three Doric Greek temples as follows: three details of columns from the Temple of Hera I [Basiclia] at the upper left; the Temple of Athena [Cere] in the distance at center left; Temple of Hera II [Neptune] at the center; Temple of Hera I at center right; with small details of grazing donkeys, flowers and a standing woman at lower center.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite on light brown wove paper

Landscape View of Rome from the Banks of the Tiber River, with Distant Views of the Castle Sant Angelo, Claude's Villa, and Saint Peter's Basilica, Part 1

value: Horizontal view of the Roman landscape from the banks of the Tiber River looking South with the Castle Sant Angelo, Claude's Villa and Saint Peter's Basilica in the distance.
